== Corjuem (626683) ==

Corjuem is a village in the [[Bardez]] taluka of [[North Goa]] district with an area of 488.26 hectares and harbouring 640 households with total population of 2725 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[MAPUSA]] is at a distance of 7 km. Male population is 1303 and female population is 1422. Scheduled Caste Population is 252 and Scheduled Tribes population is 54. Census Location Code of the village is 626683<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
